messages.alphaNumeric: Field must contain only standard letters and numbers
messages.minLength: Field must have at least {length} characters.
messages.maxLength: Field must have a maximum of {length} characters.
messages.correctFormat: Field must be in the correct format.
messages.password: Password must contain minimum 8 and maximum 20 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and, one special character.
messages.wrongCredentials: User with provided credentials doesn't exist.
